item.title: Installing RStudio daily builds
item.author: aron.atkins@gmail.com (Aron Atkins)
item.description: As a member of the team at RStudio, I install the daily build of our open source RStudio IDE almost every morning. There are published ways to download and install these builds for Linux but that doesn’t work for me. My main development machine is a Macbook Pro, and, well, we’re different. After far too many iterations of “google for ‘rstudio daily mac’ then download the DMG then mount it then copy the application to /Applications”, I put on my “Let’s write a script for that!
